full_summary:
## Request for Standing Offer - Bulk Aviation Fuel
## First Issued Date: 2022-12-15
## Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-25 14:00:00 (EST)

**Tender Details**

* Reference Number: WS3761283182-Doc3792015077
* Solicitation Number: WS3761283182
* Amendment Number: 2

**Procurement Details**

* Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Category: Goods (1211)
* UNSPC Code: 15101504 (Aviation Fuel)
* Regions of Delivery: 
  • Northwest Territories
  • Quebec (except National Capital Region)
  • Alberta
  • New Brunswick
  • Nova Scotia
  • Manitoba
  • Prince Edward Island
  • Newfoundland and Labrador
  • Canada
  • National Capital Region
  • British Columbia
  • Ontario (except National Capital Region)
  • Saskatchewan

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) among others.

**Contracting Entity**

The Canadian Government, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and is the contracting entity for this procurement.

**Contact Information**

For further details or to obtain a copy of the solicitation document, please contact:
Pam Munz, SPAC/PSPC
Email: [pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice and Solicitation Document**

The notice and solicitation document are available on the Ariba Discovery platform at:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14908607?extsite=MTQ5MDg2MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This Request for Standing Offer is for National Master Standing Offers for bulk aviation fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable. Deliveries to various locations in Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from April 1, 2023 up to and including March 31, 2025. This procurement is subject to the Tlicho Land Claims Agreement, the Gwich’in Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement, and the Inuvialuit Final Agreement, for deliveries to Inuvik, NT
